title: 皐月賞の後に・まずは腹ごしらえ

text_block_list.text: Having achieved a splendid victory in the 'Satsuki Sho', Matikanetannhauser shows his determination for the 'Japanese Derby'.
Mihono Bourbon and Rice Shower, while showing their frustration, vow to grow even further.
Thus, each in their own way, they advance, aiming for victory in the upcoming 'Japanese Derby'.
